title: I_Explorer的部落格
subTitle: The only hope you have is to accept the fact that you're already dead, and the sooner you accept that, the sooner you'll be able to function as a soldier's supposed to function. Without mercy, without compassion, without remorse. All war depends on it.

P7.postTitle: MiBox 4S EMMC（原盒子系統）的恢復
P7.description:
1.備份文件所在位置：  
>/media/devmon/ZhaoYangE40/009xznetdisk/Mi4/Mibox4s/miui_backup/BACKUP-arm-64-emmc.img.gz  

2.armbian啟動盤所在盤位：  
>MiNAS（T420）  

3.運行U盤啟動APP  

4.檢查ddbr文件夾內有沒有img.gz文件  

5.執行命令  
>“armbian-ddbr”  

6.選R（Restore）



。
